zh.title: 华为Ascend高校教学合作计划
zh.subtitle: 华为Ascend高校教学合作计划，旨在帮助高校使用华为全栈AI的技术能力，开展高校人工智能学科建设，培养产业转型和创新发展所需要的新工科人才；
zh.subtitleone: 基于华为Atlas 200DK开发者套件，提供教学资源支持，开展教学实验合作，开创课程&课题。
zh.firstTab: 华为沃土AI人才培养计划
zh.fertile: 华为沃土AI人才培养计划
zh.fertilesub: 参与华为Ascend高校教学合作，您需要先申请加入华为沃土AI人才培养计划
zh.notYet: 我还没有加入沃土计划
zh.youcan: 通过华为沃土AI人才培养计划，您可获得以下资源支持：
zh.theorysub: 高校老师可以对华为Ascend芯片相关知识以及Atlas 200DK进行深入了解，并在华为的协助下，共同设计教学计划、开发课程大纲与教学课件。涉及Ascend的教学内容建议不低于2学时。
zh.firsttheory: •  基于华为Ascend官网的资料进行在线学习，并参加华为在线培训
zh.thirdtheory: •  根据Ascend官网指导试用开发板，问题可在官网论坛求助
zh.fifththeory: •  设计教学计划、课程大纲、课件
zh.sevenththeory: • 华为资料及芯片相关的建议、意见、吐槽等集中收集并反馈给华为
zh.buildsub: 华为工程师将协助高校老师搭建教学用实验室环境。
zh.secondbuilds: 、实验用计算机、网络，并根据开发板需要准备相关软件版本。
zh.thirdbuild: •  提供线上流程指导，在教学开发板到位后，对实验室环境、软件版本、安装调测、上板实验等一系列动作与流程提供指导。
zh.fourthbuild: • 根据Ascend官网指导进行实验室搭建与开发板安装调测。
zh.fifthbuild: 开发板安装使用过程中的问题，可在官网论坛求助。
zh.sixthbuild: • 环境安装、安装指导资料相关的问题、建议、意见、吐槽等集中收集并反馈给华为。
zh.computersub: 华为工程师将配合高校老师设计上机大作业、上机计划、并参与优秀大作业评选。
zh.firstcomputer: • 提供大作业指导原则建议、选题建议、上板时长与上机时间统筹建议、大作业评议标准建议等
zh.thirdcomputer: • 提供开发板版本、开发板成熟度、算子能力、外设使用等介绍。
zh.computertext: • 设计上机大作业课题、大作业评议标准
zh.fourthcomputer: •  参与并支持大作业评审/评议，以及线下支撑和答疑。
zh.fifthcomputer: • 上机实验过程中的问题，可在官网论坛求助。
zh.sixthcomputer: •  华为开发板、开发工具使用的相关的问题、建议、意见、吐槽等集中收集并反馈给华为。
zh.seventhcomputer: • 输出大作业课题、上机计划。
zh.achievementsub: • 通过华为与高校的教学合作过程，希望教师与学生能够对华为Ascend芯片、开发板、开发工具提出宝贵意见，协助华为更好的改进教学合作，提升芯片产品能力。
zh.secondachievementsub: • 优秀的学生大作业将作为案例与范本在华为Ascend官网进行对外展示
zh.firstachievement: • 请填写调查问卷并反馈至Ascend@huawei.com
zh.thirdachievement: • 大作业评议结果、优秀大作业、教学活动过程记录请发送至：Ascend@huawei.com
zh.twotime: （D教学内容建议不低于2学时，建议与华为共同沟通制定）
zh.curriculum: （确定后的课程大纲、课件等，请发至教学合作接口人：Ascend@huawei.com）
zh.such: （如需申请华为现场支撑，请联系教学合作接口人：Ascend@huawei.com）

en.title: University Partnerships
en.subtitle: Empowering the construction of AI disciplines in universities and inspiring future engineering talents for industry transformation and innovation
en.subtitleone: With Huawei Atlas 200 DK, providing educational resources, carrying out academic and research collaborations, and exploring subjects and courses
en.fertilesub: Join Huawei Developer Enablement Plan to participate in Huawei university partnerships.
en.theorysub: Gain in-depth knowledge of Huawei Ascend chipsets and Atlas 200 DK, and design teaching plans, course outlines, and teach courseware with Huawei's assistance. At least two class hours are expected for the teaching on Ascend.
en.firsttheory: Online learning and training on Huawei's Ascend website
en.thirdtheory: Development board trial with Ascend guidance and support from the Ascend forum
en.fourththeory: Reference of teaching courseware (Da Vinci associated)
en.sevenththeory: Feedback to Huawei on Ascend documentation and chipsets
en.buildsub: Set up lab environments with Huawei engineers' assistance.
en.secondbuilds: Experiment PCs and networks, and required software
en.thirdbuild: Online guidance on the lab setup, software selection, installation and debugging, and board experiment
en.fourthbuild: Lab setup and development board installation and debugging according to the Ascend guidance
en.sixthbuild: Feedback to Huawei on environment setup and Ascend documentation
en.computersub: Design hands-on assignments and hands-on operation plans, with Huawei engineers' assistance, and evaluate hands-on assignments with Huawei's participation
en.firstcomputer: Suggestions on the instructional principles, subject selection, hands-on operation time, and evaluation criteria of hands-on assignments
en.thirdcomputer: Guidance on the development board version, development board maturity, operator capabilities, and peripheral usage
en.computertext: Hands-on assignment subjects and evaluation criteria
en.fourthcomputer: Assignment co-evaluation and offline technical support
en.sixthcomputer: Feedback to Huawei on the development board and tools
en.seventhcomputer: Outputs including hands-on assignment subjects and hands-on operation plan
en.achievementsub: Teachers and students are encouraged to provide suggestions that will help improve the capabilities of Huawei Ascend chipsets, developer boards, and tools
en.secondachievementsub: Excellent student assignments will be showcased on the Huawei Ascend website as cases and samples.
en.firstachievement: Please fill up the questionnaire and send it to: Ascend@huawei.com
en.thirdachievement: Please send the assignment evaluation results, excellent assessments, and teaching logs to: Ascend@huawei.com
en.twotime: (At least two class hours are expected for the teaching on Ascend.)
en.curriculum: (Please send the finalized course outline and courseware to: Ascend@huawei.com)
en.eighthours: (At least eight class hours are expected.)
en.img: (including promotion pictures, posters, and video clips)
